messageBody:
Yea, this is probably more of a mock objects type question, but I thought
I'd post it here to see what ideas others might have.

I have a function that all it does is take a message body, and set of
parameters (i.e., recipient list, smtp server, authentication info, etc). It
is supposed to send the email.

Signature is like this (semi java code, not implemented yet):

protected boolean sendEmail(Collection<String> recipients, HashTable
config);

Now, I'd really like to be able to test this without having to actually send
the email as the email addresses are taken from a database. Plus, the whole
purpose of using JUnit is to automate the testing process...

Thanks for any input

Bryce
